creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Luno: The Easy and Secure way to Buy, Store, Explore and Trade Cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ripple (XRP), Ethereum (ETH) and Litecoin (LTC)



Whether you’re new to Bitcoin or an advanced cryptocurrency trader, our crypto wallet and trading exchange provides a safe and secure platform to buy Bitcoin and other digital currencies like Ripple, Ethereum, Litecoin and more. With over 3.5M customers in 40+ countries, our global team of over 300 dedicated professionals are always on hand to simplify your crypto journey. So whether you are looking to buy your first Bitcoin, or execute the perfect cryptocurrency trading strategy, Luno is here for you.

Buy Bitcoin and Crypto with Ease



If you’re new to cryptocurrency, or just don’t have the time to commit to trading, our instant buy and sell feature takes the complexity out of crypto trading. It gives you instant access to a range of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC) and more, without needing to understand how to operate and execute complex trades on an exchange.

Set Bitcoin Price Alerts or Utilise Advanced Charting



From advanced cryptocurrency charting, to simple Bitcoin price updates, our app caters to all levels of user. Set price alerts for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin, so that when the market moves you can take full advantage, or plan for the next Bitcoin price move in advance through our crypto trading platform.

Trade Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies



Looking for a more advanced crypto trading experience? Our BTC and crypto exchanges have you covered. Your BTC, ETH, XRP and LTC trades can be easily executed, with all the necessary features you need for trading included. Switch over to our crypto exchange mode and trade between many supported pairs, including BTC/ETH, BTC/LTC, BTC/XRP and more, or swap between the old world and the new with BTC/fiat pairs, allowing you to Buy Bitcoin with the Rand, Naira, Ringgit, Euro or IDR Rupiah.

Safely Secure Your Funds with our Crypto & Bitcoin Wallets



We have built our platform with a laser focus on security and user safety, providing a simple and safe way to store your crypto. Whether a Bitcoin Wallet, Ethereum Wallet, Ripple Wallet or Litecoin wallet, you can sleep easy knowing your cryptocurrency is safe, with no need to worry about losing your Private Keys.

Supported Countries

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Guernsey, Hungary, Iceland, Indonesia, Ireland, Isle of Man, Italy, Jersey, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Nigeria, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Uganda, United Kingdom, Zambia.

About Luno

Founded in 2013, Luno has been in cryptocurrency for almost as long as Bitcoin. We believe wholeheartedly that cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin have the ability to upgrade the world to a better financial system. With 8+ billion dollars in processed transactions, we believe we have built one of the world’s most sophisticated Bitcoin security systems, and have never been compromised.

At Luno we are striving to create as safe, simple and feature rich an experience as possible for our customers, as they make their way into the world of Crypto. Whether you’re looking for a secure Bitcoin Wallet, an easy way to Buy Bitcoin (BTC) or Cryptocurrencies such as Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) or Litecoin (LTC), an advanced crypto trading platform, or simply a safe space to explore and learn about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies, we have you covered.

Luno: The Easy and Secure way to Buy, Store, Explore and Trade Cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ripple (XRP), Ethereum (ETH) and Litecoin (LTC)



Whether you’re new to Bitcoin or an advanced cryptocurrency trader, our crypto wallet and trading exchange provides a safe and secure platform to buy Bitcoin and other digital currencies like Ripple, Ethereum, Litecoin and more. With over 5M customers in 40+ countries, our global team of over 300 dedicated professionals are always on hand to simplify your crypto journey. So whether you are looking to buy your first Bitcoin, or execute the perfect cryptocurrency trading strategy, Luno is here for you.

Buy Bitcoin and Crypto with Ease



If you’re new to cryptocurrency, or just don’t have the time to commit to trading, our instant buy and sell feature takes the complexity out of crypto trading. It gives you instant access to a range of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC) and more, without needing to understand how to operate and execute complex trades on an exchange.

Set Bitcoin Price Alerts or Utilise Advanced Charting



From advanced cryptocurrency charting, to simple Bitcoin price updates, our app caters to all levels of user. Set price alerts for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin, so that when the market moves you can take full advantage, or plan for the next Bitcoin price move in advance through our crypto trading platform.

Trade Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies



Looking for a more advanced crypto trading experience? Our BTC and crypto exchanges have you covered. Your BTC, ETH, XRP and LTC trades can be easily executed, with all the necessary features you need for trading included. Switch over to our crypto exchange mode and trade between many supported pairs, including BTC/ETH, BTC/LTC, BTC/XRP and more, or swap between the old world and the new with BTC/fiat pairs, allowing you to Buy Bitcoin with the Rand, Naira, Ringgit, Euro or IDR Rupiah.

Safely Secure Your Funds with our Crypto & Bitcoin Wallets



We have built our platform with a laser focus on security and user safety, providing a simple and safe way to store your crypto. Whether a Bitcoin Wallet, Ethereum Wallet, Ripple Wallet or Litecoin wallet, you can sleep easy knowing your cryptocurrency is safe, with no need to worry about losing your Private Keys.

Supported Countries

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Guernsey, Hungary, Iceland, Indonesia, Ireland, Isle of Man, Italy, Jersey, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Nigeria, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Uganda, United Kingdom, Zambia.

About Luno

Founded in 2013, Luno has been in cryptocurrency for almost as long as Bitcoin. We believe wholeheartedly that cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin have the ability to upgrade the world to a better financial system. With 8+ billion dollars in processed transactions, we believe we have built one of the world’s most sophisticated Bitcoin security systems, and have never been compromised.

At Luno we are striving to create as safe, simple and feature rich an experience as possible for our customers, as they make their way into the world of Crypto. Whether you’re looking for a secure Bitcoin Wallet, an easy way to Buy Bitcoin (BTC) or Cryptocurrencies such as Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) or Litecoin (LTC), an advanced crypto trading platform, or simply a safe space to explore and learn about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies, we have you covered.

title:
Luno - BTC & Crypto Investing
8.59.1

creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/risk-summary-uk

Established in 2013 and used by millions of customers worldwide, Luno is your crypto investment platform for buying, trading, storing and exploring cryptocurrencies including: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT) and more.¹

Transparency is fundamental to our operations. Luno stores all crypto on a 1:1 basis and we release regular independently-audited proof of reserves. We are a licensed Financial Services Provider in South Africa and regulated by the Securities Commission in Malaysia. Cryptoassets are not regulated in the UK and Luno is not licensed by the FCA.

Key Features:

Buy and sell a range of cryptocurrencies: Luno enables buying, selling, and storing of cryptocurrencies. We vet all cryptocurrencies against Luno's internal due diligence standards before making them available, and provide straightforward information to help you understand the risks so you can build and execute an investment strategy that’s right for you.

Storage and Wallet: Rest assured in the knowledge your cryptocurrency assets are stored with Luno's cryptocurrency wallet. Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto, according to an April 2023 ranking by CCData: https://ccdata.io/research/exchange-benchmark-rankings.

Real-time Market Data and Price Alerts: Stay ahead of the crypto market with Luno's real-time market data and price alerts. Set custom alerts and access advanced charting tools for informed decisions.

Advanced Crypto Trading Exchange: Trade with Luno's advanced exchange. Access a wide range of pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/LTC, and more.¹

User-Centric Interface: Enjoy a hassle-free experience with Luno's intuitive and user-centric interface, suitable for users of all levels.

—

1. Available in select territories.

Security and Compliance:

Luno is committed to being one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms globally. We prioritise regulatory compliance and implement intensive security processes. Our transparent approach includes vetting all cryptocurrencies and features against strict due diligence standards, as well as providing you with straightforward information to understand the risks and benefits of crypto investment.

Luno operates in over 40 countries. Our licences and registrations can be verified on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be verified here: https://www.luno.com/help/en/articles/1000168415.

Invest Responsibly:

While investing in cryptocurrency offers significant opportunities, it also comes with risks. The value of digital assets can fluctuate, potentially resulting in the loss of capital. At Luno, we are dedicated to empowering users to invest safely and responsibly in the world of digital assets.

Download Luno today and join millions of users worldwide in the journey of cryptocurrency investment.

This Financial Promotion has been approved by Archax Ltd on 05/06/2024.

title:
Luno: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
8.66.2

creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Join millions of people worldwide using Luno to buy, sell and store their cryptocurrency.

Luno is your easy and secure way to invest in crypto, helping you explore cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Tether (USDT), Avalanche (AVAX) and more.

Luno Pty Ltd is a licensed financial services provider, registration number 53314, and is registered with the Financial Intelligence Centre, under registration number AI/130605/00024.

Key Features:

Buy and sell cryptocurrencies: Easily buy, sell, and store a range of cryptocurrencies. Luno ensures all cryptocurrencies meet our internal due diligence standards. With straightforward, clear information, we can help you make informed investment decisions.

Safe storage and secure wallet: Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto.

Earn by staking Ethereum and Cardano: Stake your Ethereum (ETH) and Cardano (ADA) with Luno and earn crypto passively. With rewards paid out weekly, you can grow your crypto assets without having to lift a finger.

Predict Bitcoin prices and win: Put your crypto knowledge to the test and predict the price of Bitcoin to be in with a chance of winning up to $10,000 BTC with Luno’s Price Predict.

Advanced crypto trading exchange: Get the most out of your crypto trading with an advanced exchange built to deliver. Access a wide range of crypto/fiat pairs and crypto/crypto pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/SOL, BTC/XRP and more.

Set price alerts and use advanced tools: Keep up-to-date on all the latest price moves with real-time market data and custom price alerts. Access advanced charting tools for better trading decisions.

Stay updated with crypto news: Get the latest crypto news, insights, and educational resources directly from our platform.

User-friendly interface: Enjoy a smooth experience with Luno's intuitive interface, perfect for users of all levels.

—

Secure your cryptocurrency funds with Luno's crypto wallet:

We take the security of your crypto, investments and information seriously. Since 2013, we've helped millions of users worldwide invest safely in crypto by adhering to strict legal, risk, and security standards. Your funds are securely stored on a 1:1 basis, and our robust processes ensure the integrity of your investment.

Transparency is fundamental to us. Luno operates in over 40 countries and maintains regulatory compliance in each market. Our licences and registrations can be viewed on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be viewed here: https://guide.luno.com/hc/en-gb/articles/11035643143325-What-are-Luno-s-fees-and-transaction-limits.

—

Investing in Crypto assets may result in the loss of capital. Luno (Pty) Ltd is a licenced financial services provider, registration number 53314.

—

To find out more visit www.luno.com

Luno is your easy and secure way to invest in crypto, helping you explore cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Tether (USDT), Avalanche (AVAX) and more.

Luno Pty Ltd is a licensed financial services provider, registration number 53314, and is registered with the Financial Intelligence Centre, under registration number AI/130605/00024.

Key Features:

Buy and sell cryptocurrencies: Easily buy, sell, and store a range of cryptocurrencies. Luno ensures all cryptocurrencies meet our internal due diligence standards. With straightforward, clear information, we can help you make informed investment decisions.

Safe storage and secure wallet: Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto.

Earn by staking Ethereum and Cardano: Stake your Ethereum (ETH) and Cardano (ADA) with Luno and earn crypto passively. With rewards paid out weekly, you can grow your crypto assets without having to lift a finger.

Predict Bitcoin prices and win: Put your crypto knowledge to the test and predict the price of Bitcoin to be in with a chance of winning up to $10,000 BTC with Luno’s Price Predict.

Advanced crypto trading exchange: Get the most out of your crypto trading with an advanced exchange built to deliver. Access a wide range of crypto/fiat pairs and crypto/crypto pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/SOL, BTC/XRP and more.

Set price alerts and use advanced tools: Keep up-to-date on all the latest price moves with real-time market data and custom price alerts. Access advanced charting tools for better trading decisions.

Stay updated with crypto news: Get the latest crypto news, insights, and educational resources directly from our platform.

User-friendly interface: Enjoy a smooth experience with Luno's intuitive interface, perfect for users of all levels.

—

Secure your cryptocurrency funds with Luno's crypto wallet:

We take the security of your crypto, investments and information seriously. Since 2013, we've helped millions of users worldwide invest safely in crypto by adhering to strict legal, risk, and security standards. Your funds are securely stored on a 1:1 basis, and our robust processes ensure the integrity of your investment.

Transparency is fundamental to us. Luno operates in over 40 countries and maintains regulatory compliance in each market. Our licences and registrations can be viewed on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be viewed here: https://guide.luno.com/hc/en-gb/articles/11035643143325-What-are-Luno-s-fees-and-transaction-limits.

—

Investing in Crypto assets may result in the loss of capital. Luno (Pty) Ltd is a licenced financial services provider, registration number 53314.

—

To find out more visit www.luno.com
descriptionShort: Invest in Cryptocurrencies

title:

8.67.0

creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/risk-summary-uk

Established in 2013 and used by millions of customers worldwide, Luno is your crypto investment platform for buying, trading, storing and exploring cryptocurrencies including: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT) and more.¹

Transparency is fundamental to our operations. Luno stores all crypto on a 1:1 basis and we release regular independently-audited proof of reserves. We are a licensed Financial Services Provider in South Africa and regulated by the Securities Commission in Malaysia. Cryptoassets are not regulated in the UK and Luno is not licensed by the FCA.

Key Features:

Buy and sell a range of cryptocurrencies: Luno enables buying, selling, and storing of cryptocurrencies. We vet all cryptocurrencies against Luno's internal due diligence standards before making them available, and provide straightforward information to help you understand the risks so you can build and execute an investment strategy that’s right for you.

Storage and Wallet: Rest assured in the knowledge your cryptocurrency assets are stored with Luno's cryptocurrency wallet. Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto, according to an April 2023 ranking by CCData: https://ccdata.io/research/exchange-benchmark-rankings.

Real-time Market Data and Price Alerts: Stay ahead of the crypto market with Luno's real-time market data and price alerts. Set custom alerts and access advanced charting tools for informed decisions.

Advanced Crypto Trading Exchange: Trade with Luno's advanced exchange. Access a wide range of pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/LTC, and more.¹

User-Centric Interface: Enjoy a hassle-free experience with Luno's intuitive and user-centric interface, suitable for users of all levels.

—

1. Available in select territories.

Security and Compliance:

Luno is committed to being one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms globally. We prioritise regulatory compliance and implement intensive security processes. Our transparent approach includes vetting all cryptocurrencies and features against strict due diligence standards, as well as providing you with straightforward information to understand the risks and benefits of crypto investment.

Luno operates in over 40 countries. Our licences and registrations can be verified on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be verified here: https://www.luno.com/help/en/articles/1000168415.

Invest Responsibly:

While investing in cryptocurrency offers significant opportunities, it also comes with risks. The value of digital assets can fluctuate, potentially resulting in the loss of capital. At Luno, we are dedicated to empowering users to invest safely and responsibly in the world of digital assets.

Download Luno today and join millions of users worldwide in the journey of cryptocurrency investment.

This Financial Promotion has been approved by Archax Ltd on 05/06/2024.

title:
Luno: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
8.77.1

creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/risk-summary-uk

Established in 2013 and used by millions of customers worldwide, Luno is your crypto investment platform for buying, trading, storing and exploring cryptocurrencies including: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT) and more.¹

Transparency is fundamental to our operations. Luno stores all crypto on a 1:1 basis and we release regular independently-audited proof of reserves. We are a licensed Financial Services Provider in South Africa and regulated by the Securities Commission in Malaysia. Cryptoassets are not regulated in the UK and Luno is not licensed by the FCA.

Key Features:

Buy and sell a range of cryptocurrencies: Luno enables buying, selling, and storing of cryptocurrencies. We vet all cryptocurrencies against Luno's internal due diligence standards before making them available, and provide straightforward information to help you understand the risks so you can build and execute an investment strategy that’s right for you.

Storage and Wallet: Rest assured in the knowledge your cryptocurrency assets are stored with Luno's cryptocurrency wallet. Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto, according to an April 2023 ranking by CCData: https://ccdata.io/research/exchange-benchmark-rankings.

Real-time Market Data and Price Alerts: Stay ahead of the crypto market with Luno's real-time market data and price alerts. Set custom alerts and access advanced charting tools for informed decisions.

Advanced Crypto Trading Exchange: Trade with Luno's advanced exchange. Access a wide range of pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/LTC, and more.¹

User-Centric Interface: Enjoy a hassle-free experience with Luno's intuitive and user-centric interface, suitable for users of all levels.

—

1. Available in select territories.

Security and Compliance:

Luno is committed to being one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms globally. We prioritise regulatory compliance and implement intensive security processes. Our transparent approach includes vetting all cryptocurrencies and features against strict due diligence standards, as well as providing you with straightforward information to understand the risks and benefits of crypto investment.

Luno operates in over 40 countries. Our licences and registrations can be verified on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be verified here: https://www.luno.com/help/en/articles/1000168415.

Invest Responsibly:

While investing in cryptocurrency offers significant opportunities, it also comes with risks. The value of digital assets can fluctuate, potentially resulting in the loss of capital. At Luno, we are dedicated to empowering users to invest safely and responsibly in the world of digital assets.

Download Luno today and join millions of users worldwide in the journey of cryptocurrency investment.

This Financial Promotion has been approved by Archax Ltd on 05/06/2024.

title:
Luno: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
8.78.1

creator: Luno
descriptionHtml:
Join millions of people worldwide using Luno to buy, sell and store their cryptocurrency.

Luno is your easy and secure way to invest in crypto, helping you explore cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Tether (USDT), Avalanche (AVAX) and more.

Luno Pty Ltd is a licensed financial services provider, registration number 53314, and is registered with the Financial Intelligence Centre, under registration number AI/130605/00024.

Key Features:

Buy and sell cryptocurrencies: Easily buy, sell, and store a range of cryptocurrencies. Luno ensures all cryptocurrencies meet our internal due diligence standards. With straightforward, clear information, we can help you make informed investment decisions.

Safe storage and secure wallet: Luno aims to be one of the most compliant crypto investment platforms in the world. We take a regulation-first approach and have some of the most intensive security processes in crypto.

Earn by staking Ethereum and Cardano: Stake your Ethereum (ETH) and Cardano (ADA) with Luno and earn crypto passively. With rewards paid out weekly, you can grow your crypto assets without having to lift a finger.

Predict Bitcoin prices and win: Put your crypto knowledge to the test and predict the price of Bitcoin to be in with a chance of winning up to $10,000 BTC with Luno’s Price Predict.

Advanced crypto trading exchange: Get the most out of your crypto trading with an advanced exchange built to deliver. Access a wide range of crypto/fiat pairs and crypto/crypto pairs including BTC/ETH, BTC/SOL, BTC/XRP and more.

Set price alerts and use advanced tools: Keep up-to-date on all the latest price moves with real-time market data and custom price alerts. Access advanced charting tools for better trading decisions.

Stay updated with crypto news: Get the latest crypto news, insights, and educational resources directly from our platform.

User-friendly interface: Enjoy a smooth experience with Luno's intuitive interface, perfect for users of all levels.

—

Secure your cryptocurrency funds with Luno's crypto wallet:

We take the security of your crypto, investments and information seriously. Since 2013, we've helped millions of users worldwide invest safely in crypto by adhering to strict legal, risk, and security standards. Your funds are securely stored on a 1:1 basis, and our robust processes ensure the integrity of your investment.

Transparency is fundamental to us. Luno operates in over 40 countries and maintains regulatory compliance in each market. Our licences and registrations can be viewed on our website: https://www.luno.com/en/legal/licenses. Our fees and transaction limits can also be viewed here: https://guide.luno.com/hc/en-gb/articles/11035643143325-What-are-Luno-s-fees-and-transaction-limits.

—

Investing in Crypto assets may result in the loss of capital. Luno (Pty) Ltd is a licenced financial services provider, registration number 53314.

—

To find out more visit www.luno.com
